solution_line_template: {total_pieces}-{equal_pieces_count} = <<{total_pieces}-{equal_pieces_count}={unequal_pieces_count}>>{unequal_pieces_count} pieces of the rope are {length_of_unequal_piece_mm}mm each in length

The {unequal_pieces_count} pieces have a total length of {unequal_pieces_count}*{length_of_unequal_piece_mm} = <<{unequal_pieces_count}*{length_of_unequal_piece_mm}={total_length_of_unequal_pieces}>>{total_length_of_unequal_pieces}mm

There is a length of {total_rope_length_mm}-{total_length_of_unequal_pieces} = <<{total_rope_length_mm}-{total_length_of_unequal_pieces}={remaining_length_for_equal_pieces}>>{remaining_length_for_equal_pieces}mm left

{remaining_length_for_equal_pieces} mm into {equal_pieces_count} equal pieces will give each piece as {remaining_length_for_equal_pieces}/{equal_pieces_count} = <<{remaining_length_for_equal_pieces}/{equal_pieces_count}={length_of_each_equal_piece_mm}>>{length_of_each_equal_piece_mm}mm long
